lead_paragraph: Rickie Fowler hopes to turn golf's 'Big Three' into a 'Fab Four' this year by following up his victory in Abu Dhabi on Sunday with his first triumph in a major championship.

headline.print_headline: Fowler Out to Make It Golf's 'Fab Four' After Abu Dhabi Win
headline.main: Fowler Out to Make It Golf's 'Fab Four' After Abu Dhabi Win

snippet: Rickie Fowler hopes to turn golf's 'Big Three' into a 'Fab Four' this year by following up his victory in Abu Dhabi on Sunday with his first triumph in a major championship....
